name: Amazing Cat
description:
See what happens when your cat stays home alone!
Amazing cat is an easy to learn, fun to play and hard to master endless runner game. 
Try to catch as many mice as possible, but beware of the dogs who are trying to stop you. 
No time limit! Only your skills count.
    
Features:

  •      100% Free
  •      Beautiful vibrant, handmade graphics.
  •      One click or tap play.
  •      Smooth animations.
  •      Great sound effects and pleasant music.
  •      Works great on mobile devices with full iOS, Android and Windows Phone support.
  •      No need to install anything, Amazing Cat is HTML5 that works without Flash or Java.

    
Amazing Cat is:

  •  Easy to learn
  •  Fun to master
  • A relaxing and addictive play
  • Rich in smooth animations
  • Beautiful handmade graphic
